channel.title: Hello i just registered today! i got a couple of questions about easyrsc
channel.description:
hello everyone! im new to the forums! ive been playing this game sence rsc became popular where i live all the way back in 2003. i was 12! now im 21! XD
nice to see that there is still development!
anyways im happy to be a part of this project. i miss this game.
so for my questions... im trying to so ive been trying to make a client i compiled (based off of the source code of easyrsc) act better.
how would i do the following: impliment a report system? add a jagex style sleep/fatigue console? sign the applet of the client so it can be a webclient? change the logon screen to be random like moparscape4.php? and impliment a music system like moparscape4.php? play sound effects when certain actions are taken ingame?

item.title: Hello i just registered today! i got a couple of questions about easyrsc
